original_text: No! But I was with you every day in the yard of the temple. You did not try to take hold of me then. But now really is the time and the place for you to work. Now it is a bad dark time, when the Devil has authority.’
korean_text: 내가 날마다 너희와 함께 성전에 있을 때에 내게 손을 대지 아니하였도다 그러나 이제는 너희 때요 어둠의 권세로다 하시더라

sentences.original_text: But I was with you every day
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 매일 너희와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: in the yard of the temple
You did not try to take hold of me then
But now really is the time
and the place for you to work
Now it is a bad dark time
